name: Pro-Dolphin
description:
This is my entry for the Wowie Jam 3.0. Based on the theme, I was inspired to make a skateboarding game, where doing bad moves, gives you points. In the end I changed it up a bit to make it a game where you play as a dolphin, and doing sloppy tricks, gives you points, instead of the classic "Good moves = more points."

NO MOUSE SUPPORT (it is sadly a limitation of my game engine.)
